body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Noah Roberts and the customer's name is Susan Watson.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Alex. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my account online.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. I can help you with that. Could I have your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And for security purposes, could you also provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's July fourth, nineteen eighty-four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Sarah. I have all the information I need. I will now check your account. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, Sarah, I have reset your account access. You should be able to log in now. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alex. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. Have a great day!
